name: 7.62mm Armor Piercing Round
description: 7.62mm Armor Piercing Rounds are used by theBolt Action Rifleand theHunting Rifle. Unlike arrows, javelins, and bolts this ammunition is destroyed on impact and cannot be recovered. Unlike standard ammunition, the 7.62mm Armor Piercing Round can pierce hardened points and will deal 250 damage, similar to hitting a non-hardened point.
